name: Only Four
description:
Submitted to GMTK Game Jam 2021

You are a spaceship, trying to survive waves of enemies! Your ship has four different attatchers to join up with special powerups, but once a powerup is chosen, it cannot be removed. Will you take the extra health, and waste a slot for more firepower? Choose wisely!

Green = Extra speed

Blue = More powerful laser

Red = More health / Higher max health
